content: elongated chevron rib stitch blanket yarn note work 2 strands together 4 skeins caron one pound worsted weight in the color of your choice i used lilac materials size 17 32 circular needles 6 large place markers pattern cast on 101 sts work garter stitch border k 6 row note k the first 5 sts and the last 5 sts of every row throughout begin chart on rs row note that you will work the first column the greyed-out stitch on the chart only at the beginning of the rs row/end of the ws row then repeat the remaining columns across the remainder of the body row 1 p1 * k2 p2 twice k1 p2 k2 twice p1 repeat from * to end row 2 work even row 3 work even row 4 work even row 5 p1 *p1 k2 p2 k2 p3 k2 p2 twice repeat from * to end row 6 work even row 7 work even row 8 work even row 9 k1 * p2 k2 twice p1 k2 p2 twice k1 repeat from * to end row 10 work even row 11 work even row 12 work even row 13 k1 *k1 p2 k2 p2 k1 p1 k1 p2 k2 twice repeat from * to end row 14 work even row 15 work even row 16 work even work approximately ten repeats or until reaches desired length i ended on a row 16 to keep it neat looking but it doesn t really matter work garter stitch border k 6 row cast off weave in loose ends and block
